insertProduct.caption: Workflow Manager
insertProduct.description: Provides tools for work management, that help automate and simplify GIS and non-GIS work.

content.buttonTooltip: Update current user's profile and add new users.

button.caption: New Workflow (Classic) Connection
button.tooltip: Add a connection to a Workflow Manager (Classic) database to the project. Only one workflow connection can be added per project.

button.caption: Add Workflow (Classic) Connection
button.tooltip: Add a connection to a Workflow Manager (Classic) database to the project.

button.caption: Job Properties
button.tooltip:
Show the Job Properties pane.
You can update multiple job properties at once.

button.caption: Workflow Pane (Classic)
button.tooltip: Show the Workflow pane with jobs assigned to you and your group. No workflow connection in project

button.caption: Workflow View (Classic)
button.tooltip: Show the Workflow view with jobs in a list and map based on selected criteria. No workflow connection in project

button.caption: Close
button.tooltip: Close workflow job(s). Current user does not have the Close Job privilege.

button.caption: Reopen
button.tooltip: Reopen closed workflow job(s). Current user does not have the Reopen Close Job privilege.

button.caption: Export to CSV
button.tooltip:
Export workflow job(s) to a CSV file.
Job can only be exported when the query is active.

button.caption: Export Job
button.tooltip:
Export workflow job(s) to a JXL file.
Not available yet.

button.caption: Export Query
button.tooltip:
Export query results to a CSV file.
Not available yet.

button.caption: Export Report
button.tooltip:
Export report results to an HTML file.
Not available yet.

button.caption: Parent Child Relationship
button.tooltip: View heirarchy of job relationships.Not available yet.

button.caption: Dependent On
button.tooltip: View heirarchy of job relationships.Not available yet.

button.caption: Dependent To
button.tooltip: View heirarchy of job relationships.Not available yet.

button.caption: Take Offline
button.tooltip: Take jobs offline. Already in offline mode.

button.caption: Bring Online
button.tooltip: Bring jobs back online. Unable to bring jobs online while in offline mode

button.caption: Delete Jobs
button.tooltip: Delete workflow job(s) Current user does not have the Delete Jobs privilege or unable to delete job(s) while in offline mode

button.caption: Delete Version
button.tooltip: Delete workflow job version(s) Current user does not have the Delete Versions privilege or unable to delete version(s) while in offline mode

button.caption: Delete Map
button.tooltip: Delete workflow job map(s) Current user does not have the Delete MXDs privilege

button.caption: Subscribe
button.tooltip:
Subscribe to workflow notifications.
Not available yet.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove Selected Workflow (Classic) Connection - Context Menu
button.tooltip: Remove workflow (Classic) connection from the project

button.caption: Open Workflow Connection
button.extendedCaption: Open Selected Workflow Connection - Context Menu
button.tooltip: Open the workflow connection

button.caption: Update Data Workspace Login
button.tooltip: Update individual login for a data workspace No data workspace with an individual login configured

button.caption: Workflow Administrator
button.extendedCaption: Open in ArcGIS Workflow Manager Administrator
button.tooltip: Open the current connection in ArcGIS Workflow Manager Administrator ArcGIS Pro Administrator is not installed, the current user does not have the AdministratorAccess privilege or an online Workflow (Classic) connection is not available.

button.caption: Update Users and Groups
button.extendedCaption: Add User to Workflow Groups - Context Menu
button.tooltip: Update the current user's profile and add the user to workflow groups. The current user does not have the AdministratorAccess privilege or an online Workflow (Classic) connection is not available.

button.caption: Current User
button.tooltip: Assign job to current user Job is already assigned to the current user, or the current user does not have privileges to assign the job.

button.caption: Execute Step
button.tooltip: Execute the current workflow step

button.caption: Mark Step Complete
button.tooltip: Mark the workflow step as complete

button.caption: Refresh
button.tooltip: Refresh the current job There is no current job

button.caption: Take Offline
button.tooltip: Take jobs offline.

button.caption: Bring Online
button.tooltip: Bring jobs back online.

button.caption: Clone Job
button.tooltip: Clone the current job Current user does not have the Create Job privilege or there is no current job.

button.caption: Clear LOI
button.tooltip: Clear the Location of Interest

button.caption: Close
button.extendedCaption: Cancel Defining Job Location of Interest
button.tooltip: Close the map and discard changes to Location of Interest

button.caption: Save and Close
button.tooltip: Save changes to the Location of Interest and close the map

checkBox.caption: Buffer Points/Lines
checkBox.tooltip: Buffer points/lines to be saved as polygons

checkBox.caption: Merge Features
checkBox.tooltip: Merge features into a single LOI

editBox.caption: Buffer Distance
editBox.tooltip: The number of units to create the buffer

comboBox.caption: Buffer Units
comboBox.tooltip: Select the unit measurement to be used to buffer points/lines

button.caption: Execute Step
button.tooltip: Execute the current workflow step

button.caption: Mark Step Complete
button.extendedCaption: Mark Selected Step Complete - Context Menu
button.tooltip: Mark the workflow step as complete

button.caption: Set as Current Step
button.extendedCaption: Set Selected Step as Current Step - Context Menu
button.tooltip: Set as Current Step.

button.caption: Open Step Help
button.extendedCaption: Open Step Help For Selected Step - Context Menu
button.tooltip: Open Step Help.

button.caption: Workflow Manager (Classic)
button.tooltip: Add the task item to the Workflow Manager (Classic) repository. Not connected to a Workflow (Classic) repository, or the current user does not have privileges to add tasks to the Workflow Manager (Classic) repository.

button.caption: New Attachment...
button.tooltip: Add a new attachment to the current job

button.caption: Manage Attachments
button.tooltip: Manage attachments from a dockable window.

button.caption: Add to Favorites
button.tooltip: Add Job Type to list of favorites

button.caption: Remove from Favorites
button.tooltip: Remove Job Type from list of favorites

button.caption: Advanced...
button.tooltip: Open the Create New Jobs GP tool to provide more advanced options

button.caption: Fit To Window
button.tooltip: Fit workflow diagram to window so you can see all steps.Only when workflow tab in job view is the active tab.

button.caption: Zoom to Current Step
button.extendedCaption: Zoom Workflow Diagram To Current Step
button.tooltip: Zoom to current step.Only when workflow tab in job view is the active tab.

button.caption: Zoom in
button.tooltip: Zoom in on the workflow diagram.Only when workflow tab in job view is the active tab.

button.caption: Zoom out
button.tooltip: Zoom out from the workflow diagram.Only when workflow tab in job view is the active tab.

button.caption: Pan
button.tooltip: Pan in the workflow diagram.Only when workflow tab in job view is the active tab.

button.caption: Map
button.tooltip: Export Map to Workflow Manager (Classic) Database.

gallery.caption: New Job
gallery.tooltip: Create new workflow job(s). Current user does not have the Create Job privilege.

dockPane.caption: Job Attachments
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Manage job attachments in the project

dockPane.caption: Job Properties
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open the Workflow view to get started.

dockPane.caption: Update Users and Groups
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open an online Workflow (Classic) connection and give the current user the AdministratorAccess privilege to get started.

insertCondition.caption: In a map pane
Map not open by step
A Workflow (Classic) Connection can be added
A Workflow (Classic) Connection exists
A Task item can be added to the Workflow (Classic) Repository
A Workflow (Classic) Connection is online and the user is an administrator
The user is able to open the Pro Admin
Pro is connected to server
User has administrator privileges
Configuration has an individual data workspace
A Worflow job can be created
A Worflow job can be assigned
A Worflow job can be exported
A Worflow job can be closed
A Worflow job can be reopened
A Worflow user can subscribe to notifications
A Workflow user can update job properties
A Workflow user can update the LOI
A Workflow user is defining an LOI
A Workflow user is buffering points/lines while defining an LOI
Unimplemented functionality that should always be disabled
The user can assign the job to themself
A job is executing
Connected to an online workflow repository and user can take jobs offline
Connected to an online workflow repository
The user can use workflow diagram navigation tool
A Worflow job can be deleted
A Worflow job version can be deleted
A Worflow job map can be deleted
